name: devproxy_GetBestPractices
description: Gets a list of best practices for configuring and using Dev Proxy. Call it for any code generation or operation involving Dev Proxy. These best practices do not change so once it has been called during the current session, you do not need to invoke it again. Returns a markdown string.

name: devproxy_FindDocs
description: Finds the relevant Dev Proxy documentation for the given query

query.description: The keyword search query to find documentation for

version.description: Dev Proxy version to get documentation for in the format x.y.z, eg. 0.27.0

name: devproxy_GetVersion
description: Gets the currently installed Dev Proxy version
